text:
"Gue gak peduli lu mikir apa, tapi gue pengen lu ngerti satu hal, lu cuma main-main sama gue, dan gue juga sama lu. Gak lebih dari itu."
Jaehyun terdiam, terpaku dengan tatapan yang penuh kejutan. Sungho jarang menunjukkan sikap seperti ini, apalagi dengan nada yang begitu penuh emosi. Jaehyun tahu Sungho bukan tipe yang mudah kehilangan kendali, tapi kali ini jelas ada sesuatu yang berbeda.
"Sungho, lu-" Jaehyun mencoba berbicara, namun Sungho segera mengangkat tangannya, menghentikan segala kata yang akan keluar dari mulut Jaehyun.
"Gue gak mau denger alasan atau apa pun dari lu," ucap Sungho dengan dingin.
"Gue gak peduli apa yang lu pikir tentang gue. Jaehyun, gue punya batasan, dan lu udah melewati itu. Mulai sekarang, kita lupakan ini semua. Gue gak mau ini terjadi lagi."
trans:
"I don't care what you think, but I want you to understand one thing, you're just messing around with me, and so am I. Nothing more than that."
Jaehyun fell silent, stunned with a look full of surprise. Sungho rarely acted like this, especially with such an emotional tone. Jaehyun knew Sungho wasn't the type who easily lost control, but this time it was obvious something was different.
"Sungho, you-" Jaehyun tried to talk, but Sungho immediately raised his hand, stopping any words that were about to come out of Jaehyun's mouth.
"I don't want to hear any excuses or anything from you," said Sungho coldly.
"I don't care what you think about me. Jaehyun, I have boundaries, and you've already crossed them. From now on, let's forget about all of this. I don't want this to happen again."
